name: Painting
text: There’s a reason we’re the most trusted house painter on Cape Cod. We are trained to make your painting dreams come true. When you hire Alpha Custom to paint the interior or exterior of your home we try to make it as painless for you as possible.

name: Power washing
text: Power washing is used to clean your house exterior (house washing), deck, outdoor furniture as well as for commercial uses such as concrete cleaning and removing contaminants like mold or mildew that have adhered to  the surface of a building.
